findings.title: Tokenomics Implementation Inconsistency
findings.description: The current code implementation of Tokenomics does not match the whitepaper description.

findings.title: Tokens of Any User
findings.description: Privileged accounts can perform arbitrary transfer by setting _defaultBonusPool to an arbitrary account and using the reward method.

findings.title: Missing Emit Events
findings.description: Functions that affect the status of sensitive variables should emit events as notifications to users.

findings.title: Privileged Accounts BUSINESS_ROLE can Transfer Tokens of Any User
findings.description: The `BUSINESS_ROLE` privileged account can perform arbitrary transfer operations by setting `_defaultBonusPool` to an arbitrary account and using the `reward` method, leading to security risks.

findings.title: Gas optimization in Deviews contract
findings.description: Using uint256 will increase gas consumption when deploying and calling the contract.
